General.Name: Immobel
General.Description: Immobel SA engages in the real estate development business in Belgium, Luxemburg, France, Germany, Poland, and Spain. The company undertakes office, residential, and retail projects, as well as develops real estate projects for living, working, and recreational activities. It also provides project management and leasing services. The company was formerly known as Allfin NV and changed its name to Immobel SA in June 2016. The company was incorporated in 1863 and is headquartered in Brussels, Belgium.
General.Address: Rue de la Régence 58, Brussels, Belgium, 1000
